info.name: Firefox: New Button Styles
info.description:
Change the look of Firefox navigation toolbar buttons. Only for large icons mode.
Compatible with Australis (Firefox 29).
info.additionalInfo: Inspired by the shiny style 39995. And the obvious contrast between the new tabs and the old-style buttons. This style is for Windows only - Firefox 4 on Linux treats buttons differently and I can't test on Macs, so I don't know if it will work (probably not). I'm using the same selectors of the default theme, so this style should handle extension buttons the same way as the default (if the button looks odd/broken with the default theme, this style will NOT fix it). Anyway, if you see some button that doesn't look OK, tell me in the "Discussions" section below. (03/12/2013) Compatibility with Australis. (25/03/2011) Compatibility with All-in-One-Sidebar. Thanks user 94536 for pointing the issue. (15/04/2011) Support for RTL locales. (30/05/2011) Support OmniSidebar extension. (15/08/2011) Support for Firefox 8. (17/08/2011) Support for Firefox 9, 10 and 11. (25/12/2011) Dropped support for Firefox 7 and older. (03/03/2012) Compatibility with Firefox 13. (06/06/2012) Dropped compatibility with Firefox 12-; Compatibility with Vertical Toolbar. (28/08/2012) Dropped support for Firefox 13 and older; Support for Firefox 18. (03/12/2013) Compatibility with Australis (Firefox 28).
